name: Excessive Speed AR race
description:
Simply the fastest Mobile game in Augmented reality !
Excessive Speed is an Augmented Reality game develloped with ARKit where you control a car in fantastic race atmosphere.
The rules are simple : No Gear, No break, just... Speed up! for reach.... an Excessive Speed.
Speed up while driving through Power up and tap the screen to change direction.
Beat the Enemy and collect gold for unlock new cars and tracks.
Earn Google Play award by beating speed record and different challenge.
More than 20 vehicules allready available througout 7 awesome tracks.
Share your best moment with friends and get more coins !
New Tracks and vehicules to comes!
All game content can be unlocked by playing or rather by driving!

Come on... we'll see if you really like speed...

If you need any help for setting your AR place you could write us on support, we'll be happy to help you.
Don't hesitate to post your feedback and idea to improve the game.

Thanks you and Good Games !
